framework.control

Class ComponentAuthorizationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.control.ComponentAuthorizationManager

  • public class ComponentAuthorizationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores and checks authorizations of components (control interfaces and modules) based on their (int) rights.

    TODO:
    - Merge with/add to Java SecurityManager subsystem.
    - Add a dynamic session ID?

    Author:
    Stefan Werner

      • verifyAllComponentRights

        void verifyAllComponentRights(java.lang.String componentId,
                              int... rights)
                       throws AuthorizationException
        Verifies a component hold ALL given rights.
        Parameters:
        componentId - the component id
        rights - the rights
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if component does NOT hold ALL given rights

        Parameters:
        componentId - the component ID
        rights - the rights
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if component does NOT hold ANY given rights
